snippet: The games, part of an outdoor stadium series, will feature the Rangers and the Devils on Jan. 26,  and the Rangers and the Islanders on Jan. 29.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks defeat Detroit Red Wings, 4-1, in Game 1 of their Western Conference semifinal series; other NHL news noted.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: The games, part of an outdoor stadium series, will feature the Rangers and the Devils on Jan. 26,  and the Rangers and the Islanders on Jan. 29.

headline.seo: Yankee Stadium Will Host Two N.H.L. Games
headline.main: Yankee Stadium Will Host Two N.H.L. Games
